name: Tiny Combat
description:
Demo Day 19 Build

Fly the jet around and shoot at the targets. Unfortunately there's not much else
going on in the demo day build because this is all so fresh. There are several
aerial targets to destroy, and a handful of ground targets. You can press R to
restart the scenario.

Controls

The entire game was designed around an Xbox One controller. If you have it, it's highly recommended you use it. I can't guarantee how well it works with other gamepads. Backup keyboard controls have been added, but this wasn't designed with keyboard in mind.

Xbone Controller (Recommended)

Gun: A
Missiles: B
Target: Y
Switch: X
Pitch: Left Thumbstick Up/Down
Roll: Left Thumbstick Left/Right
Yaw: Left/Right Triggers
Speed up: Left Bumper
Slow down: Right Bumper
Look around: Right Thumbstick

Keyboard

Gun: L.Ctrl
Missiles: Space
Target: Q
Switch: C
Pitch: Up/Down Arrow
Roll: Left/Right Arrow
Yaw: A/D
Speed up: W
Slow down: S
Restart: R

Using missiles

Lock onto a target with Y (Xbone gamepad) or Q (keyboard) and fly towards the target. You can hold down the target key to lock the camera to the target to help you find them. Once the target box turns red, they are locked and a missile will track the target if it's launched.

Press the Switch button to switch to the second set of missiles. These are bigger
and have a longer range, but take a little longer to lock and aren't as maneuverable.
